word_mean: 钆：一种稀有元素，原子序数64，原子量157.25，符号Gd

sentence.Network_en: The elements which have been studied most are those from gadolinium to thulium.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究得最多的是从钆到铥之间的元素.

sentence.Network_en: Gadolinium - diethylenetriaminepentaacetate - bismethylamide ( Gd - DTPA - BMA ) was delivered intravenously as contrast agent to trace the blood labyrinth barrier change.
sentence.Network_cn: 静脉注射T1增强剂Gadolinium-diethylenetriaminepentaacetate-bismethylamide ( Gd-DTPA-BMA ) 作为血迷路屏障的示踪剂.

sentence.Network_en: The RE impurities in gadolinium oxide are determined by ICP - AES .
sentence.Network_cn: 采用ICP -AES 法测定氧化钆中稀土杂质,考察了基体浓度、酸度对被测元素的影响.

auth_sentence.content: Gadolinium is a metal with distinctive magnetic properties that increase its visibility during MRI scans.

auth_sentence.content: There are two non-gadolinium-based imaging agents on the market, though the FDA has approved them only for liver scans.
